name: Roy Tang
text: I get the general intent Nick, but let's face it, if one of the other candidates made a speech during his campaign sorties that say "mga taga-Davao mga gago yan" or something to that effect, even if they were only referring to a subset of people, it would not be received well to say the least. sad lang na kelangan mag fan ng flames of "Us vs them" rhetoric even though supposedly standing for unity     On a side note, matutuwa pa mga taga-Manila if he adds a holiday for Lapu-Lapu hehe
